verbs.description: rolling hills mansion that largely underground [V: is] going up for auction john z blazevich built hacienda de la paz a 51 000-square - foot mansion on 7 4 acres in rolling hills and then tried to sell it nobody bought five years later it going up for auction the property features include nine bedrooms 25 bathrooms multiple elevators and a turkish bath john z blazevich hills concierge auctions chad roffers contessa rolling hills mansion hearst castle
